Anyone else getting corrupt picture at 21:23 (using windows 7, vlc 1.03)?

It's consistently there.

It's weird. The video is out of sync in Media Player Classic (with Combined Community Codec Pack), while all other secret_myth rips play fun.

I played the file in Windows Media Player 12 and it plays fine, no out of sync. Either way, I downloaded another version of Zombieland that plays fine regardless

@ people having audio out of sync issues

It seems to have something to do with klcodec pack, and the way secretmyth encodes his/her recent videos (starting from whip it) because I went to http://mpc-hc.sourceforge.net/ and installed ONLY MPC (without codec) and the audio was in sync. So for people that are having problems, try uninstalling klcodec and install ONLY MPC.
